caption.p: Humoral response of challenged and contact ferrets. Data represent endpoint titers of IgM (a and b) and IgG (c and d) antibodies against the glycoprotein of EBOV in the serum of challenged and contact ferrets at euthanasia. C, challenged animal; D, direct-contact animal; I, indirect-contact animal; M, male (left column); F, female (right column).
